verses.verse: בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old שְׁמֹנֶ֤ה <S%H8083><s%> she-mo-Neh [was] eight שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years יֹאשִׁיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2977><s%> yo-shi-Ya-hu Josiah בְמָלְכ֔וֹ <S%H4427><s%> ve-ma-le-Cho, when he began to reign וּשְׁלֹשִׁ֤ים <S%H7970><s%> u-she-lo-Shim thirty וְאַחַת֙ <S%H259><s%> ve-'a-Chat and one שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim; in Jerusalem וְשֵׁ֣ם <S%H8034><s%> ve-Shem name אִמּ֔וֹ <S%H517><s%> im-Mo, And his mother's יְדִידָ֥ה <S%H3040><s%> ye-di-Dah [was] Jedidah בַת־ <S%H1323><s%> vat- the daughter עֲדָ֖יָה <S%H5718><s%> 'a-Da-yah of Adaiah מִבָּצְקַֽת׃ <S%H1218><s%> mib-ba-tze-Kat. of Boscath

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as And he did הַיָּשָׁ֖ר <S%H3477><s%> hai-ya-Shar [that which was] right בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וַיֵּ֗לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> vai-Ye-lech, and walked בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all דֶּ֙רֶךְ֙ <S%H1870><s%> de-rech in all the way דָּוִ֣ד <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid of David אָבִ֔יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv, his father וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> ve-lo- nor סָ֖ר <S%H5493><s%> sar and turned not aside יָמִ֥ין <S%H3225><s%> ya-Min to the right hand וּשְׂמֹֽאול׃ <S%H8040><s%> u-se-Mol. or to the left פ Peh

וַיְהִ֗י <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi, become בִּשְׁמֹנֶ֤ה <S%H8083><s%> bish-mo-Neh eight עֶשְׂרֵה֙ <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh teen שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, year לַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> lam-Me-lech of king יֹאשִׁיָּ֑הוּ <S%H2977><s%> yo-shi-Ya-hu; Josiah שָׁלַ֣ח <S%H7971><s%> sha-Lach sent הַ֠מֶּלֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> Ham-Me-lech [that] the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שָׁפָ֨ן <S%H8227><s%> sha-Fan Shaphan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son אֲצַלְיָ֤הוּ <S%H683><s%> 'a-tzal-Ya-hu of Azaliah בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- the son מְשֻׁלָּם֙ <S%H4918><s%> me-shul-Lam of Meshullam הַסֹּפֵ֔ר <S%H5608><s%> has-so-Fer, the scribe בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit to the house יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

עֲלֵ֗ה <S%H5927><s%> 'a-Leh, Go up אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to חִלְקִיָּ֙הוּ֙ <S%H2518><s%> chil-ki-Ya-hu to Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֣ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen priest הַגָּד֔וֹל <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-Dol, the high וְיַתֵּ֣ם <S%H8552><s%> ve-yat-Tem that he may sum אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכֶּ֔סֶף <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ke-sef, the silver הַמּוּבָ֖א <S%H935><s%> ham-mu-Va which is brought בֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> beit into the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which אָסְפ֛וּ <S%H622><s%> 'a-se-Fu have gathered שֹׁמְרֵ֥י <S%H8104><s%> sho-me-Rei which the keepers הַסַּ֖ף <S%H5592><s%> has-Saf of the door מֵאֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> me-'Et הָעָֽם׃ <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am. of the people

וְיִתְּנֹה ve-yit-te-noh כוְיִתְּנֻ֗הוּ <S%H5414><s%> ve-yit-te-Nu-hu, deliver קעַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- into יַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> yad it into the hand עֹשֵׂ֣י <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sei of the doers הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> ham-me-la-Chah, of the work הַמֻּפְקָדִ֖ים <S%H6485><s%> ham-muf-ka-Dim that have the oversight; בְּבֵית be-veit כבֵּ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> Beit the house קיְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וְיִתְּנ֣וּ <S%H5414><s%> ve-yit-te-Nu And let them deliver אֹת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, לְעֹשֵׂ֤י <S%H6213><s%> le-'o-Sei it to the doers הַמְּלָאכָה֙ <S%H4399><s%> ham-me-la-Chah of the work אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit of the house יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, of the LORD לְחַזֵּ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> le-chaz-Zek to repair בֶּ֥דֶק <S%H919><s%> Be-dek the breaches הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit. which [is] in the house

לֶחָ֣רָשִׁ֔ים <S%H2796><s%> le-Cha-ra-Shim, Unto carpenters וְלַבֹּנִ֖ים <S%H1129><s%> ve-lab-bo-Nim and builders וְלַגֹּֽדְרִ֑ים <S%H1443><s%> ve-lag-go-de-Rim; and masons וְלִקְנ֤וֹת <S%H7069><s%> ve-lik-Not and to buy עֵצִים֙ <S%H6086><s%> 'e-Tzim timber וְאַבְנֵ֣י <S%H68><s%> ve-'av-Nei stone מַחְצֵ֔ב <S%H4274><s%> mach-Tzev, and hewn לְחַזֵּ֖ק <S%H2388><s%> le-chaz-Zek to repair אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבָּֽיִת׃ <S%H1004><s%> hab-Ba-yit. the house

אַ֚ךְ <S%H389><s%> 'ach Only לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- no יֵחָשֵׁ֣ב <S%H2803><s%> ye-cha-Shev Howbeit there was no reckoning made אִתָּ֔ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-Tam, for הַכֶּ֖סֶף <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ke-sef with them of the money הַנִּתָּ֣ן <S%H5414><s%> han-nit-Tan that was delivered עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- into יָדָ֑ם <S%H3027><s%> ya-Dam; into their hand כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki for בֶאֱמוּנָ֖ה <S%H530><s%> ve-'e-mu-Nah faithfully הֵ֥ם <S%H1992><s%> hem they עֹשִֽׂים׃ <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sim. because they dealt

וַ֠יֹּאמֶר <S%H559><s%> Vai-yo-mer said חִלְקִיָּ֜הוּ <S%H2518><s%> chil-ki-Ya-hu And Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֤ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen priest הַגָּדוֹל֙ <S%H1419><s%> hag-ga-dOl the high עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- unto שָׁפָ֣ן <S%H8227><s%> sha-Fan unto Shaphan הַסֹּפֵ֔ר <S%H5608><s%> has-so-Fer, the scribe סֵ֧פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer the book הַתּוֹרָ֛ה <S%H8451><s%> hat-to-Rah of the law מָצָ֖אתִי <S%H4672><s%> ma-Tza-ti I have found בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit in the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-Ten gave חִלְקִיָּ֧ה <S%H2518><s%> chil-ki-Yah And Hilkiah אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַסֵּ֛פֶר <S%H5612><s%> has-Se-fer the book אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to שָׁפָ֖ן <S%H8227><s%> sha-Fan to Shaphan וַיִּקְרָאֵֽהוּ׃ <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-ra-'E-hu. and he read

וַיָּבֹ֞א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Vo came שָׁפָ֤ן <S%H8227><s%> sha-Fan And Shaphan הַסֹּפֵר֙ <S%H5608><s%> has-so-Fer the scribe אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, to the king וַיָּ֥שֶׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shev again אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech the king דָּבָ֑ר <S%H1697><s%> da-Var; word וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <S%H559><s%> vai-Yo-mer, and said הִתִּ֤יכוּ <S%H5413><s%> hit-Ti-chu have gathered עֲבָדֶ֙יךָ֙ <S%H5650><s%> 'a-va-Dei-cha Thy servants אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַכֶּ֙סֶף֙ <S%H3701><s%> hak-Ke-sef the money הַנִּמְצָ֣א <S%H4672><s%> han-nim-Tza that was found בַבַּ֔יִת <S%H1004><s%> vab-Ba-yit, in the house וַֽיִּתְּנֻ֗הוּ <S%H5414><s%> vai-yit-te-Nu-hu, and have delivered עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- into יַד֙ <S%H3027><s%> yad it into the hand עֹשֵׂ֣י <S%H6213><s%> 'o-Sei of them that do הַמְּלָאכָ֔ה <S%H4399><s%> ham-me-la-Chah, the work הַמֻּפְקָדִ֖ים <S%H6485><s%> ham-muf-ka-Dim that have the oversight בֵּ֥ית <S%H1004><s%> beit of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וַיַּגֵּ֞ד <S%H5046><s%> vai-yag-Ged shewed שָׁפָ֤ן <S%H8227><s%> sha-Fan And Shaphan הַסֹּפֵר֙ <S%H5608><s%> has-so-Fer the scribe לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> lam-Me-lech the king לֵאמֹ֔ר <S%H559><s%> le-Mor, saying סֵ֚פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer me a book נָ֣תַן <S%H5414><s%> Na-tan hath delivered לִ֔י Li, חִלְקִיָּ֖ה <S%H2518><s%> chil-ki-Yah Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֑ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen; the priest וַיִּקְרָאֵ֥הוּ <S%H7121><s%> vai-yik-ra-'E-hu read שָׁפָ֖ן <S%H8227><s%> sha-Fan And Shaphan לִפְנֵ֥י <S%H6440><s%> lif-Nei it before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech. the king

וַֽיְהִי֙ <S%H1961><s%> vay-Hi become כִּשְׁמֹ֣עַ <S%H8085><s%> kish-Mo-a' had heard הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech, And it came to pass when the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- דִּבְרֵ֖י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei the words סֵ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> Se-fer of the book הַתּוֹרָ֑ה <S%H8451><s%> hat-to-Rah; of the law וַיִּקְרַ֖ע <S%H7167><s%> vai-yik-Ra' that he rent אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בְּגָדָֽיו׃ <S%H899><s%> be-ga-Dav. his clothes

וַיְצַ֣ו <S%H6680><s%> vay-Tzav commanded הַמֶּ֡לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech And the king אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- חִלְקִיָּ֣ה <S%H2518><s%> chil-ki-Yah Hilkiah הַכֹּהֵ֡ן <S%H3548><s%> hak-ko-Hen the priest וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et אֲחִיקָ֣ם <S%H296><s%> 'a-chi-Kam and Ahikam בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> be-no-Sha- the son שָׁ֠פָן <S%H8227><s%> fan of Shaphan וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עַכְבּ֨וֹר <S%H5907><s%> ach-Bor and Achbor בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son מִיכָיָ֜ה <S%H4320><s%> mi-cha-Yah of Michaiah וְאֵ֣ת׀ <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et שָׁפָ֣ן <S%H8227><s%> sha-Fan and Shaphan הַסֹּפֵ֗ר <S%H5608><s%> has-so-Fer, the scribe וְאֵ֛ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et עֲשָׂיָ֥ה <S%H6222><s%> 'a-sa-Yah and Asahiah עֶֽבֶד־ <S%H5650><s%> 'e-ved- a servant הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> ham-Me-lech of the king's לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

לְכוּ֩ <S%H1980><s%> le-Chu Go דִרְשׁ֨וּ <S%H1875><s%> dir-Shu ye enquire אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD בַּעֲדִ֣י <S%H1157><s%> ba-'a-Di about וּבְעַד־ <S%H1157><s%> u-ve-'ad- about הָעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> ha-'Am, for me and for the people וּבְעַד֙ <S%H1157><s%> u-ve-'Ad about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- and all יְהוּדָ֔ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah, and for all Judah עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning דִּבְרֵ֛י <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei concerning the words הַסֵּ֥פֶר <S%H5612><s%> has-Se-fer of this book הַנִּמְצָ֖א <S%H4672><s%> han-nim-Tza that is found הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh; of this כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for גְדוֹלָ֞ה <S%H1419><s%> ge-do-Lah for great חֲמַ֣ת <S%H2534><s%> cha-Mat [is] the wrath יְהוָ֗ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher- after הִיא֙ <S%H1931><s%> hi that נִצְּתָ֣ה <S%H3341><s%> nitz-tze-Tah that is kindled בָ֔נוּ Va-nu, עַל֩ <S%H5921><s%> 'al concerning אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> lo- have not שָׁמְע֜וּ <S%H8085><s%> sha-me-'U have not hearkened אֲבֹתֵ֗ינוּ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tei-nu, against us because our fathers עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- concerning דִּבְרֵי֙ <S%H1697><s%> div-Rei unto the words הַסֵּ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> has-Se-fer of this book הַזֶּ֔ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh, of this לַעֲשׂ֖וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot to do כְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> ke-chol- to all הַכָּת֥וּב <S%H3789><s%> hak-ka-Tuv according unto all that which is written עָלֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H5921><s%> 'a-Lei-nu. concerning
